hater.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who hates a type of person or thing
hater.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He was a hater of injustice.
hater.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who expresses their disapproval of a person, often on the Internet or Twitter – used to show disapproval
hater.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: We love you – just ignore the haters!
